definitions.definition: (especially of people in the armed forces) to make a formal sign of respect to someone, especially by raising the right hand to the side of the head:
examples: Whenever you see an officer, you must salute.

definitions.definition: a sign of respect made to someone by raising the right hand to the side of the head:
examples: The soldier gave a salute and the officer returned it.

definitions.definition: an action, such as firing a gun, done to show respect to someone:
examples: Full military honours and a 21-gun salute (= 21 guns fired at the same time) marked his funeral.
